devdoc.author: Matt Condon (@shrugs)
devdoc.details: Provides counters that can only be incremented, decremented or reset. This can be used e.g. to track the number of elements in a mapping, issuing ERC721 ids, or counting request ids. Further modified by Darko Kolev, constructor Include with `using Counters for Counters.Counter;`
devdoc.title: Counters
